action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a credit against tax for qualified special law enforcement officers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tax Credit for Veterans and Retired Law Enforcement Officers for Securing Schools Act.

section.header: Credit for qualified special law enforcement officers

subsection.text: Subpart A of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting after section 25D the following new section:

section.header: Credit for qualified special law enforcement officers

subsection.text: In the case of a qualified special law enforcement officer, there shall be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by this chapter for a taxable year an amount equal to $1,500.

paragraph.text: The term qualified special law enforcement officer means an individual—

subparagraph.text: employed part-time by a local law enforcement agency to patrol one or more qualified schools, and
who is, on the date such individual is first so employed, a qualified veteran or a qualified retired law enforcement officer.
an elementary school or secondary school (as such terms are defined in section 8101 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965), or
an institution of higher education (as such term is defined in section 101 of the Higher Education Act of 1965).

paragraph.text: The term qualified veteran means an individual who served in the active military, naval, or air service, and who was discharged or released therefrom under conditions other than dishonorable.
The term qualified retired law enforcement officer has the meaning given such term by section 926C of title 18, United States Code.

subsection.text: The table of sections for subpart A of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of such Code is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 25D the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 25E. Credit for qualified special law enforcement officers.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after the date of the enactment of this Act.
